idkhow.en:
1. Click on the "Attach" icon (paperclip icon) located next to the message input field.
2. From the menu that appears, select "Location."
3. Telegram will then ask for permission to access your location. If you are comfortable sharing your current location, click "Allow." If not, you can select "Don't Allow" and proceed to the next step.
4. If you chose not to share your current GPS location, you can still send another location by manually selecting a nearby place from the map.
5. Telegram will show you a map with a location pin. Drag the pin to the desired location to find the place you want to share.
6. Once you have selected the location, click the "Send" button.

idkhow.es:
1. Haz clic en el icono "Adjuntar" (icono de clip) que se encuentra junto al campo de entrada del mensaje.
2. En el men√∫ que aparece, selecciona "Ubicaci√≥n."

4. Si elige no compartir su ubicaci√≥n GPS actual, a√∫n puede enviar otra ubicaci√≥n seleccionando manualmente un lugar cercano en el mapa.
5. Telegram te mostrar√° un mapa con un marcador de ubicaci√≥n. Arrastra el marcador al lugar deseado para encontrar el lugar que deseas compartir.

about_page.en:
Welcome to TypeTalk! 
We're an anonymous chatbot that connects you with like-minded people based on your MBTI personality type.

Instructions: 
Type /join to start a new chat
Use /settings to customize your search parameters. 
Use /stop to end a chat anytime. 
Use /next to switch chat partners during a conversation. 

We prioritize your privacy and ensure that all chats are anonymous and kept confidential!!
